text: NAIROBI, Kenya — A court in Kenya on Wednesday found two men guilty for their role in an assault on an upscale mall in the capital, Nairobi, that killed 67 people in 2013, the first convictions in one of the deadliest terror attacks in the country’s history.
snippet: The verdicts came seven years after 67 people were killed by Shabab militants at the upscale Westgate Mall in Nairobi.
